biotools.summary: Resource that combines Triticeae ESTs/mRNAs with rice genes to find the best estimate of hexaploid wheat transcript sequences for a target gene, supplemented with information on tissue distribution and likely gene structure, to aid in primer design.

bioschemas.name: WhETS
bioschemas.summary: Resource that combines Triticeae ESTs/mRNAs with rice genes to find the best estimate of hexaploid wheat transcript sequences for a target gene, supplemented with information on tissue distribution and likely gene structure, to aid in primer design.
